plot: Haunted by images, "deja vu", Karen Gold wanders through her life, finally guided by Mark Blackhawk, her broker's advice as he places her into destiny hands.
title: The Lost Face
plot_es: Haunted by images, "deja vu", Karen Gold wanders through her life, finally guided by Mark Blackhawk, her broker's advice as he places her into destiny hands.
plot_en: Haunted by images, "deja vu", Karen Gold wanders through her life, finally guided by Mark Blackhawk, her broker's advice as he places her into destiny hands.
